comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- the prince's name was spelled "August," not "Auguste." (See also the companion photo.)

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan,

Yes, he should be identified as Ernst August, so we will adjust the name on all the photos of the Duke when we update the records. Thanks for the heads up on this typo.
